text: Karl Kehrle OSB OBE (3 August 1898, Mittelbiberach, Germany â€“ 1 September 1996, Buckfast, Devonshire, England, United Kingdom), known as Brother Adam, was a Benedictine monk, beekeeper, and an authority on bee breeding, Developer of the Buckfast bee.
